name: Baller (ChickingYT)
description:
Baller. A simple game. Where you are a ball, and you complete 3 fun levels. This game will be updated regularly, and is my first game, so it will be pretty bad.

Don't pay for this game, there really is no need to pay for this poop.

What I am working on now is a better main menu and more levels

So yeah. Have fun!
